meanings.definition: Not relating to or affecting veins.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the nonvenous medication would not impact my veins.
meanings.sent2: The nonvenous lotion is safe to use on any part of the body.
meanings.sent3: I tried to draw a nonvenous smiley face on my arm with a marker, but it looked strange.
meanings.sent4: Her nonvenous thoughts flowed freely, unbound by the constraints of traditional ideas.
meanings.sent5: The nonvenous sky was clear and blue, without a single cloud in sight.

meanings.definition: Not containing or carrying blood through veins.
meanings.sent1: The nonvenous tube was used to deliver nutrients directly into the stomach.
meanings.sent2: The nonvenous fluid was carefully administered to the patient's body.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly claimed to have a nonvenous heart that pumped chocolate instead of blood.
meanings.sent4: The nonvenous river flowed through the valley, carrying only clear water.
meanings.sent5: The nonvenous tree sap was collected for its unique properties in skincare products.
